Desc: Elementary Course - Includes comprehensive basic controls tutorials.
Elementary Course - Includes basic combat techniques that can solidify your foundation.
Complete all exam targets to obtain the B-Level License.
Intermediate Course - Includes further coordination combat techniques that will help you take on battles at an even higher difficulty level.
Intermediate Course - Includes basic Uniframe combat tutorials that can get you into the swing of our new mode.
Complete all exam targets to obtain the A-Level License.
Advanced Course - Includes advanced coordination combat skills that can maximize Constructs' strength in battle.
Advanced Course - Includes special combat skills for overcoming arduous battles.
Complete all exam targets to obtain the S-Level License.
Complete all exam targets to obtain the X-Level License.
